title: Science Leadership Competency Enhancement Program Based on Blended Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Science field leadership development program for corporate managers/leaders using blended learning models, requiring learning design that combines mobile-based microlearning and offline workshops in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can complete team-based science project planning and execution in blended learning environments within six months
Learners can complete microlearning content at least three times weekly and participate in real-time discussion forums on online learning platforms
Learners can present innovative problem-solving solutions combining digital tools and scientific theories at offline workshops
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
